comments.raw_text:
**Request Description** 
As a follow-up to the iOS private sessions design sprint, we want to learn:
* Can we remove the stigma around private browsing mode by putting users in PBM by default?
* Will privacy by default in the browser be enough to keep users coming back?

**Deadline** 
Early May to determine if this could be a MAU driver (mobile OKR)

**Priority Level** 
(1 = High 2 = Medium, 3 = Low): 1/2

**Priority Level Description** 
Related to mobile OKR

**Supporting Information**
See results section from design sprint: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ELeyVAjE4H7EmPHmP4LFi4DTlIOcHhgRwJH8ECZNccI/edit#heading=h.9ftjn5bjwq19
